tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS) due to the use of insecure regular expressions in the `consts.ts` file. These regular expressions can be exploited by attackers to cause excessive backtracking, leading to performance degradation or a denial of service.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `nope-validator` library to the patch version.
